original: Hult, Lars-Gustaf Fredrik, vägin-genjör, kapten VVK, Växjö, f. 27/4/09 i Sthlm av överste Gustaf Carl Wilhelm H. o. Gerda Klara Elisabet Dahl-bäck. G. 36 m. Ellen Isacson. — Res off:ex. 29, ex. v. KTH 33. Fänrik i Södei-manl. reg. iies. 30, löjtn. VVK 38, kapt. VVK 41. An st. s. väg- o. vatten-by ggn: styr. brokontr. 33i, tf. väginig:-assist. i Norii). 1. 36-37, bitr. ing. i väg- o. vattenbyggnrstyr. 37-38, tf. bitr. väging. 39-43, väging. v. vägför-valtn. i Kronob. 1. sed. 44.
translated: Hult, Lars-Gustaf Fredrik, road engineer, captain VVK, Växjö, b. April 27th, 1909 in Stockholm to colonel Gustaf Carl Wilhelm H. and Gerda Klara Elisabet Dahlbäck. Married in 1936 to Ellen Isacson. - Graduated from technical college in 1929, graduated from KTH in 1933. Became Second Lieutenant in Södermanland Regiment in 1930, Lieutenant in VVK in 1938, and Captain in VVK in 1941. Worked with road and water construction, as an assistant engineer in the road and water construction board from 1936-1937, deputy engineer in the road and water construction board from 1937-1938, acting deputy road engineer from 1939-1943, and as a road engineer at the road administration in Kronoberg County from 1944 and onwards.
